issue.title: [C++] IPC/RPC support on Win32 platforms
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-281](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-281). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are using a number of POSIX APIs which have incompatibilities on Windows or issues with large files (over 2 GB). I dealt with this recently in the Feather project (ASL 2.0)

https://github.com/wesm/feather/commit/8ad3453f22f6dae0f67afcd1c796c12a535143b6

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-281?focusedCommentId=15958967) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This has been resolved through a serious of patches, culminating in https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/15b874e47e3975c5240290ec7ed105bf8d1b56bc
